sentence.Network_en: Calcium cyanamide is poisonous and irritating to the skin.

sentence.Network_en: A new process, urea - calcium cyanamide method, for producing thiourea from urea and hydrogen sulfide is proposed.

sentence.Network_en: Cyanamidealsocyanamid: a caustic acidic crystalline compound, NHCNH, prepared by treating calcium cyanamide with sulfuric acid.
